exposurecontrol: Programmed auto exposure and exposure compensation (-2.0 \xC3\xA2\xC2\x80\xC2\x93 +2.0 EV in steps of 1/3 EV)
selftimer: Can be selected from 10 or 2 seconds duration
flashcontrol: TTL auto flash with monitor preflashes
focallength: 4.5-135.0mm (angle of view equivalent to that of 25-750mm lens in 35mm [135] format)
focusrange: [W]Approx. 1 ft. 8 in. (50 cm.) to infinity, [T]Approx. 6.7 ft. (2 m.) to infinity
monitor: 3.0\xC3\xA2\xC2\x80\xC2\x9D Inch, approx. 921k-dot, Wide Viewing AngleTFT-LCD with Anti-reflection coating, 5-level brightness adjustment Display
vibrationreduction: Combination of Lens-shift and Electronic VR (still pictures)
